Class AdvancedSensors

All Implemented Interfaces:
edu.ksu.cis.macr.organization.model.Capability, edu.ksu.cis.macr.organization.model.simple.SimpleCapability, GaaCapability, edu.ksu.cis.macr.simulator.capability.CapabilityAction, edu.ksu.cis.macr.simulator.capability.Failure, edu.ksu.cis.macr.simulator.environment.XMLFormat
public class AdvancedSensors
extends edu.ksu.cis.macr.simulator.capability.AbstractCapabilityAction
implements GaaCapability

The AdvancedSensors capability aggregates the set of sensors required to search the map for gold and Wumpis.

Author:
Kyle Hill
